body: var onSuccess = function(geoipResponse){var clientCountry = geoipResponse.country.iso_code;var arrEU = ['AX','AL','AD','AM','AT','AZ','BY','BE','BA','BG','HR','CY','CZ','DK','EE','FO','FI','FR','GE','DE','GI','GR','GL','GG','VA','HU','IS','IE','IM','IT','JE','LV','LI','LT','LU','MK','MV','MT','MC','ME','MZ','NL','NO','PS','PL','PT','RO','RU','WS','SM','RS','SK','SI','ES','SJ','SE','CH','TL','UA','GB','VG','AF','DZ','AO','BH','BD','BJ','BT','BW','IO','BN','BF','BI','KH','CM','CF','TD','KM','CG','CD','CI','DJ','EG','GQ','ER','ET','TF','GA','GM','GH','GN','GW','HK','IN','ID','IR','IQ','IL','JO','KZ','KE','KI','KP','KR','KW','KG','LA','LB','LS','LR','LY','MO','MG','MW','MY','ML','MR','MU','YT','MA','MM','NA','NP','NE','NG','OM','PK','PW','PH','QA','RE','RW','SH','ST','SA','SN','SC','SL','SG','SX','SB','SO','ZA','SS','LK','SD','SZ','SY','TW','TJ','TZ','TH','TG','TN','TR','TM','UG','AE','UZ','VN','EH','YE','ZM','ZW'];var arrUSA = ['US','AS','AQ','GU','MP','PR','UM','VI'];var arrASIA = ['AI','AG','AR','AW','AU','BS','BB','BZ','BM','BO','BQ','BV','BR','CA','CV','KY','CL','CX','CC','CO','CK','CR','CU','CW','DM','DO','EC','SV','FK','FJ','GF','PF','GD','GP','GT','GY','HT','HM','HN','JM','MH','MQ','MX','FM','MD','MN','MS','NR','NC','NZ','NI','NU','NF','PA','PG','PY','PE','PN','BL','KN','LC','MF','PM','VC','GS','SR','TK','TO','TT','TC','TV','UY','VU','VE','WF'];//alert('国コード：' + clientCountry);if(clientCountry === 'JP'){//window.location = 'https://www.tama.com/jp/';window.location = '/jp/';//console.log('ja');} else if(clientCountry === 'CN'){//window.location = 'https://www.tama.com/cn/';window.location = '/cn/';} else if(arrEU.indexOf(clientCountry) != -1){//window.location = 'https://www.tama.com/eu/';window.location = '/eu/';} else if(arrUSA.indexOf(clientCountry) != -1){//window.location = 'https://www.tama.com/usa/';window.location = '/usa/';} else if(arrASIA.indexOf(clientCountry) != -1){//window.location = 'https://www.tama.com/asia/';window.location = '/asia/';};};var onError = function(error){console.log("Error");};geoip2.country(onSuccess, onError);
meta_property_og:description: TAMA offers Drum Kits, Snare Drums, Original Percussion, Hardware, Microphone Stands and Sticks, plus drum accessories like bags, cases and practice goods.
